title: Slow thinking lab in a society of fast broadband connections.
abstract: This paper has focus on a question how fast broadband connections enable user friendly solutions in communication and can function as a mean of creating silent places and space for what I call Slow Thinking Lab. My main research interest is to inquire how to promote socially sustainable creative life and what do we understand by good life. How to develop equal possibilities for participation in social development and carefully chosen networks, when home is in so called periphery or isolated location? How can we apply artistic thinking in society in general and especially in innovative development processes?
